definition: "Weird Al" Yankovic (1959-), US singer and writer of parody songs
pinyin: guai4 ren2 Ao4 er3 · Yang2 ke1 wei2 qi2

definition: The Hunchback of Notre-Dame by Victor Hugo 維克多·雨果|维克多·雨果[Wei2 ke4 duo1 · Yu3 guo3]

sentences.english: Just like a camel. Your uncle is a horrible monster!
sentences.chinese: 你姑夫是个可怕的怪人”巴兹尔答道。

sentences.english: In the intervening years he became something of a jokester and goofball.
sentences.chinese: 其间多年，他变成了一个乱开玩笑的怪人。

sentences.english: This "wacko" was my biology teacher, Mr. Borman.
sentences.chinese: 这个怪人，就是我的生物课老师伯奥曼先生。

sentences.english: Cardinal Meschia was without doubt a singular character.
sentences.chinese: 红衣主教梅斯基亚无疑是个怪人。

sentences.english: He is hotheaded. He loses his temper and he worries me.
sentences.chinese: 他是个怪人，易激动，控制不住脾气，他让我担心。

sentences.english: Everyone knows Professor Wilkins is a crackpot.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道教授是个怪人。

sentences.english: Zhang couldn't find anyone similar to him, and he thought he was strange.
sentences.chinese: 张小柏无法找到相似的人，觉得自己是个怪人。

sentences.english: But what he is most known for today is supervising the 1896 study "Of Peculiar and Exceptional Children, " which described a series of only-child oddballs as permanent misfits.
sentences.chinese: 那是一篇将一系列独生子女描述成怪人的论文。

sentences.english: That screwball is wearing his shirt inside out.
sentences.chinese: 那个怪人把他的衬衣反着穿。

sentences.english: This guy is a freakin' weirdo.
sentences.chinese: 这家伙是个可恶的怪人。

sentences.english: Herr aunt effie is certainly an original .
sentences.chinese: 她的姨妈埃菲真是个怪人。

sentences.english: New Frankenstein is a comedy characterized by black humor.
sentences.chinese: 《新科学怪人》是出黑色幽默的喜剧。

sentences.english: In Frankenstein and Typee, the conflicts between good and evil are ambiguous ones.
sentences.chinese: 善恶在《科学怪人》和《泰比》中的冲突十分模糊。

sentences.english: He’s been called a dreamer and a crank.
sentences.chinese: 他曾一度被人称为空想家，怪人。

sentences.english: Her Aunt Effie is certainly an original.
sentences.chinese: 她的姨妈埃菲真是个怪人。

definition: black devil (derogatory term for black or African person)
see 老頭子|老头子[lao3 tou2 zi5]
little demon (term of endearment for a child)/mischievous child/imp
